name: codebase-cleanup
description: Codebase cleanup and technical debt reduction including dead code elimination, dependency pruning, import fixing, refactoring, and code organization improvements
author: Scientific Computing Workflows

agents.name: Code Reviewer
agents.description: Expert in code quality analysis, technical debt identification, and cleanup strategies

agents.name: Test Automator
agents.description: Specialist in test automation and quality assurance for cleanup operations

commands.name: /deps-audit
commands.description: Audit dependencies for unused packages, security issues, and optimization opportunities

commands.name: /fix-imports
commands.description: Fix and organize import statements across the codebase

commands.name: /refactor-clean
commands.description: Clean and refactor code for better organization and maintainability

commands.name: /tech-debt
commands.description: Identify and prioritize technical debt for systematic reduction
